text.headline: Auto Mobile Slowdown: A Qunatitative Study
text.text: Studied the role factors like regulation changes, NBFC crisis, rise in ride hailing services and consumer confidence played on bringing about the Automobile slowdown in 2019. Used OLS estimation to find the impact of mentioned factors.

text.headline: Hand Gesture Recognition
text.text: Trained a convolutional neural network(CNN) to recognize hand gestures. We used VPLU dataset of 1100 images to train the classifier, the model was able to correctly classify hand gestures into 11 classes with ∼ 98% accuracy.

text.headline: Reconstruction of Obfuscated Images
text.text: Used Convolutional Autoencoders to fix 3 types of Obfuscations(blur, pixelation and speckle noise) in facial images. We trained 3 different Autencoders on about 13000 images to handle the different types of obfuscations.

text.headline: Summer Internship
text.text: Worked with Prof. Kanika Mahajan on the published journal ‘Words matter: Gender, Jobs and Applicant Be- haviour’, to examine how implicit gender preference in Job ads leads to differential labor market out- comes. I used NLP techniques like tf-idf, topic modeling and word clouds to understand the difference between the kind of jobs offered and the keywords associated with respective gender preferred jobs.

text.headline: Research Assistant
text.text: Worked on the now published journal ‘Covid 19 and Supply chain disruption’. I was responsible for cleaning the data and calculating the distances between production zones and retail centres by using google maps API to find the impact of distance on supply chain disruptions.

text.headline: Synthetic Population Generation
text.text: Trained a DataSynthesizer model using NSS data to scale a dataset 15 times to about 15 million observations. Studied and presented an Iterative Proportional fitting(IPF) approach to integrate census datasets for formulating Synthetic Population in order to study the spread of Coronavirus

text.headline: Joined Fractal Analytics as a Data Scientist
text.text: Being in the Imagineer Program, Fractal allowed me to work in various feilds within Datascience. I worked on projects in Finance and Health care domain, primarily building automation tools using NLP and ML

text.headline: Invoice Processing Automation (Fractal)
text.text: Developed an Invoice processing solution using Google Vision OCR and Natural language processing. Trained a text classifier on over 600 invoices to identify relevant segments of an invoice. Used NLP (Regex) to extract required information using pattern matching.
